Name: Butterscotch Cocktail
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
22.5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
History: This child of the 1990s was originally called a Butchscotch Martini.
Nutrition: One serving of Butterscotch Cocktail contains 262 calories
